model: iFloor 3 / Floor One S3 Wet Dry Vac
seo_keywords: Tineco floor one s3 smells bad

problems.title: Max Light Flashing / Dirty Water Tank Error
problems.description: The machine stops and claims the dirty water tank is full, even when empty.
possible_causes: Debris on the metal sensors in the tank
Foam in the tank (using wrong solution)
solution_steps: Clean the two metal sensor probes inside the dirty water tank lid.
Ensure the HEPA filter is completely dry before use.
Only use Tineco solution to prevent foaming.

problems.title: Bad Smell / Odor
problems.description: The vacuum smells like wet dog or mildew when running.
solution_steps: Remove the brush roll and let it air dry in the sun.
Replace the brush roll if it is old and smelly (recommended every 4 months).
